places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Plaza
address: B. K, K. Road, Barpeta, Assam 781301, India

reviews.text:
For the price they are charging, the maintenance of the room is not upto mark. They charged 1600, for an AC room. The washroom was dirty and the taps were leaking. The room was extremely congested, considering the price tag of Rs.1600. The bed sheets were stained and had holes.

If kept clean and maintained well, it can be an okay place to stay at.
Stayed there few times. Everytime I had a wonderful experience. Staff & management is very friendly and helpful also
Not stayed there. But went nearby area.any way lodging is to some extent good not bad and location is in the heart of the town
Best service at night stay ,AC facility available here . family hotel best & good . barpeta middle place at Hotel PLAZA .Best of Good service
Room service is not so good. Room rent is high compared room quality.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Manas
address: Amolapatty, Dr, BK Rd, Barpeta, Assam 781301, India

reviews.text: I have never stayed in a hotel in Barpeta until yesterday. One of colleagues referred to Hotel Manas and I stayed in the hotel on 18th April last. Staying at Manas has been a very good experience for me. I stayed in a room on the ground floor. The room was spotlessly clean and linens were too very clean. Bathroom is well maintained.  Service of the staff is ok. Parking is a little small. However,location of the hotel is superb. I advise the management to think about providing food on order.

places_with_reviews.name: Usha Regency

reviews.text:
My experience here at Usha Regency was very bad..We booked two rooms for 1 night which was for 1200 each.The room was in the 1st floor .The room quality was very poor.They didnot maintain hygiene at all.the bathrooms had broken taps broken floor.The glasses provided in the room was full of cigarettes ashes which was not cleaned.They didn't have gyser facility in both the rooms. we were sent to another room to use the gyser at 2nd floor when inquired.After going there we found out those rooms were more spacious and better than the ones provided to us.
The room given to us was not worth the money.

Over priced
They charged 1200 per room and there was no hot water, AC was not working and TV also not working.
We found a 🐁 inside our room one day.
Room cleaning people rarely comes.
The only advantage is that there is elevator 🛗
No complementary breakfast given.
The bed was also very bad. The middle portion is dipped.
Bumla Pass...Indo-China Border (22.10.2023)

There are very few hotels in barpeta town.. Among them usha is probably the best to stay. Though it too need to improve a bit in cleanliness . Toilets and bedsheets are needed to be cleaner, and there is no fooding available. Ac/non Ac both rooms are available in various sizes according to rent. Location is quite good

Not preferred for family. Maybe good for solo traveller.
Please verify room first after that only book.  confirm your rent before booking.

places_with_reviews.name: Jonak Hotel & Restaurant
address: 9X5Q+HJ, Dona Kuchi, Garemara Pathar, Assam 781314, India

reviews.text: I had high expectations but was let down by the food quality. The place is suitable for photo shoots or gatherings, but the food doesn't match up. The naan I ordered was unexpectedly tough, requiring considerable effort to tear apart. While the interior is pleasing and the service is delivered with proper etiquette, unfortunately, the culinary experience fell short of satisfactory.
Its a great experience ... Good ambience , tasty food nd staffs are very nice.. Overall experience is satisfactory 👍
Looks nyc and food quality is very good and testy and staff behaviour is awesome ...I like this Hotel
